messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Web show
messages.msgSnippet: you can use blogtv. My kids , ages 11 & 14, have used it. There are age guidelines, so you ll want to read about it. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BlogTV
messages.messageBody:
you can use blogtv.
My kids , ages 11 & 14, have used it.
There are age guidelines, so you'll want to read about it.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BlogTV

heather

messages.subject: Web show
messages.msgSnippet: hi, my 7yo son is interested in following in icarly s footsteps and building his own webshow. Anyone have any experience as to which web sites I can look into

hi, my 7yo son is interested in following in icarly's footsteps and building his own webshow. Anyone have any experience as to which web sites I can look into for some free web hosting? If this is not the proper place to discuss this, I apologize :)
thanks, natalie
